title: Drawing, Design for Corner China Cabinet with Chinese Fretwork, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Corner China Cabinet with Chinese Fretwork
medium: Pen and black ink on thin cream paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink, lower right corner: Corner China Cabinet
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Tall, rectangular cabinet slightly flaring at back; glass panels in imitation of Chinese fretwork; pair of horizontal drawers separated by patera medallion; broken, molded, scroll-like pediments atop cabinet; molded skirting below cabinet; short, molded feet.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Corner China Cabinet with Chinese Fretwork, 1900–05. Pen and black ink on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-221.
